title: [K-12] Comparative analysis of educational effectiveness for Taiwanese Romanization systems (TGR vs. TMR)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Taiwanese vocabulary and Chinese character reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Comparative learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations. Learners experience practical applications of two notations through role-playing (teacher/learner) within simulations

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain at least three structural differences between the Taiwanese Romanization systems (TGR and TMR).
Learners can evaluate comparative analysis results of educational effectiveness between TGR and TMR in simulation environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can present at least two criteria for selecting romanization systems that reflect socio-contextual factors (policies, field opinions).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
